QuestData.Title: The Bones of Xibala
QuestData.Description: Far to the south you will find the bones of an ancient creature. This is Xibala, the progenitor, first of the devilsaurs. She was mother to Rezan, mother to all that came after. The Zandalari do not live there, as it belongs to beasts now.$b$bI have heard rumors of some of your Horde arriving in search of something among her bones.$b$bThis is ill advised. Look into it, won't you?
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Xibala and speak with Examiner Tae'shara Bloodwatcher.
